程序包 org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners

类 BwProvisioner

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners.BwProvisioner
直接已知子类:
BwProvisionerSimple
public abstract class BwProvisioner
extends java.lang.Object
BwProvisioner is an abstract class that represents the provisioning policy used by a host to allocate bandwidth (bw) to virtual machines inside it. Each host has to have its own instance of a BwProvisioner. When extending this class, care must be taken to guarantee that the field availableBw will always contain the amount of free bandwidth available for future allocations.
从以下版本开始:
CloudSim Toolkit 1.0

  • 构造器详细资料

    • BwProvisioner

      public BwProvisioner​(long bw)
      Creates the new BwProvisioner.
      参数:
      bw - The total bandwidth capacity from the host that the provisioner can allocate to VMs.

  • 方法详细资料

    • allocateBwForVm

      public abstract boolean allocateBwForVm​(Vm vm, long bw)
      Allocates BW for a given VM.
      参数:
      vm - the virtual machine for which the bw are being allocated
      bw - the bw to be allocated to the VM
      返回:
      $true if the bw could be allocated; $false otherwise

    • getAllocatedBwForVm

      public abstract long getAllocatedBwForVm​(Vm vm)
      Gets the allocated BW for VM.
      参数:
      vm - the VM
      返回:
      the allocated BW for vm

    • deallocateBwForVm

      public abstract void deallocateBwForVm​(Vm vm)
      Releases BW used by a VM.
      参数:
      vm - the vm

    • deallocateBwForAllVms

      public void deallocateBwForAllVms()
      Releases BW used by all VMs.

    • isSuitableForVm

      public abstract boolean isSuitableForVm​(Vm vm, long bw)
      Checks if it is possible to change the current allocated BW for the VM to a new amount, depending on the available BW.
      参数:
      vm - the vm to check if there is enough available BW on the host to change the VM allocated BW
      bw - the new total amount of BW for the VM.
      返回:
      true, if is suitable for vm

    • getBw

      public long getBw()
      Gets the bw capacity.
      返回:
      the bw capacity

    • setBw

      protected void setBw​(long bw)
      Sets the bw capacity.
      参数:
      bw - the new bw capacity

    • getAvailableBw

      public long getAvailableBw()
      Gets the available BW in the host.
      返回:
      available bw

    • getUsedBw

      public long getUsedBw()
      Gets the amount of used BW in the host.
      返回:
      used bw

    • setAvailableBw

      protected void setAvailableBw​(long availableBw)
      Sets the available bw.
      参数:
      availableBw - the new available bw
